# Hello, I'm Lucas Ferreira

## About me

Senior Full-Stack Engineer at [Jerasoft Co](https://www.jerasoft.com.br/), passionate about solving complex problems and creating innovative end-to-end solutions. With extensive experience across frontend and backend technologies, I architect and implement complete software systems while continuously embracing new challenges and learning opportunities.

## Education

- Graduated in Computer Science from [PUC Minas - Campus Po√ßos de Caldas](https://www.pucpcaldas.br/)
